bibl.title: The Hellenistic Economy: Indirect Intervention by the State.
Production and Public Powers in Antiquity. Eleventh International Economic History Congress, Milan, September 1994. Proceedings
bibl.author: FORABOSCHI, Daniele

bibl.note: The main forms of indirect intervention: money, wars, taxation, technology, land structures, temples, urbanization.
FORABOSCHI Daniele, The Hellenistic Economy: Indirect Intervention by the State.
Production and Public Powers in Antiquity. Eleventh International Economic History Congress, Milan, September 1994. Proceedings (Milano, 1994) pp. 73-82.
